data.title: mura in January – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Tsumagoi-mura in January and activities that are perfect for a January trip to Tsumagoi-mura.
data.text:
Overview

January is a good time to visit Tsumagoi-mura. The weather is usually freezing cold with a gentle breeze, with temperatures ranging from 19—31°F (-7—-1°C).

Tsumagoi-mura has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your January trip to Tsumagoi-mura. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to January. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Tsumagoi-mura in January. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout January, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Tsumagoi-mura? See our Tsumagoi-mura Trip Planner.

Weather in Tsumagoi-mura in January

Temperatures on an average day in Tsumagoi-mura in January

The average temperature in Tsumagoi-mura in January for a typical day ranges from a high of 31°F (-1°C) to a low of 19°F (-7°C). Some would describe it as freezing cold with a gentle breeze.

For comparison, the hottest month in Tsumagoi-mura, August, has days with highs of 81°F (27°C) and lows of 65°F (18°C). The coldest month, January has days with highs of 31°F (-1°C) and lows of 19°F (-7°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Tsumagoi-mura in January based on historical data.

Visiting Tsumagoi-mura? See our Tsumagoi-mura Trip Planner.

What to wear

What to wear in January

With an average high of 31°F (-1°C) and a low of 19°F (-7°C), it generally feels freezing cold with a gentle breeze. There might also be a small chance of rain. With that in mind, most people would dress in something toasty like a thick winter coat with gloves
